channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 01:51 Driven anxiety in the Chernihiv region.Creck on further reports.
item.description: 🟢 01:51 Driven anxiety in the Chernihiv region.Creck on further reports.#Chernihiv This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
